original_text: For while they be folden together as thorns, and while they are drunken as drunkards, they shall be devoured as stubble fully dry.
korean_text: 가시덤불 같이 엉크러졌고 술을 마신 것 같이 취한 그들은 마른 지푸라기 같이 모두 탈 것이거늘

sentences.original_text: For while they be folden together as thorns
and while they are drunken as drunkards
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 술 취한 자처럼 취해 있는 동안

sentences.original_text: they shall be devoured as stubble fully dry
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 완전히 마른 짚처럼 삼켜질 것이다
